text:
FILE: usecase-search.xmap
CHANGE:
          <map:part
src="cocoon://navigation/{page-envelope:publication-id}/live/breadcrumb/index.xml"/>
          <map:part
src="cocoon://navigation/{page-envelope:publication-id}/live/tabs/index.xml"/>
          <map:part
src="cocoon://navigation/{page-envelope:publication-id}/live/menu/index.xml"
prefix="xhtml"/>

TO:
          <map:part
src="cocoon://navigation/{page-envelope:publication-id}/live/breadcrumb{page-envelope:document-url}.xml"/>
          <map:part
src="cocoon://navigation/{page-envelope:publication-id}/live/tabs{page-envelope:document-url}.xml"/>
          <map:part
src="cocoon://navigation/{page-envelope:publication-id}/live/menu{page-envelope:document-url}.xml"
prefix="xhtml"/>
creator: solprovider@gmail.com
